scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:ts && npm run build:sass
scripts.watch: npm run clean && concurrent "npm run watch:ts" "npm run watch:sass"
scripts.watch:sass: npm run build:sass && node-sass -o dist/ -w src/
scripts.dev: concurrent "npm run watch" "browser-sync start --server --files 'dist/**/*.css, index.html, dist/**/*.js'"
